ygData.subject: Re: DE or Troll/OGRE
ygData.msgSnippet: Oops, had a mistake in my first post. hehe: Okay, unless you are fighting spectres, I do not want to argue anymore.  I keep stating my point-of-view from my
ygData.messageBody:
Oops, had a mistake in my first post. hehe:
Okay, unless you are fighting spectres, I do not want to argue anymore. I keep stating my point-of-view from my experience, but no one seem to believe me. And because your point was on the basis of the 3/4 warrior, 1/4 necro quotation from a source, I do not consider that as a valid argument. I fight spectres with another a few others and to tank a spectre is stupid. In addition, I did not say that Dark Elves are better casters; instead, I said that Dark Elves allow you to have more mana so that you can cast more DoT spells before running out of mana. Oh well, who cares about the stupid spectres anymore, that is NOT the only thing that we can fight at that level.

SK's are 3/4 warrior and 1/4 necro, not 3/4 necro and 1/4 warriors. DE's do not make the best Shadow Knights Ogres do because of the higher intell over trolls and better stength and stamina.
